verses.text_plain: Woe to the crown of pride, to the drunkards of Ephraim, whose glorious beauty is a fading flower, which are on the head of the fat valleys of them that are overcome with wine!
verses.verse_html:
1Woe to the crown of pride, to the drunkards of Ephraim, whose glorious beauty is a fading flower, which are on the head of the fat valleys of them that are overcome with wine! ▼
▼ overcome: Heb. broken

verses.text_plain: Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one, which as a tempest of hail and a destroying storm, as a flood of mighty waters overflowing, shall cast down to the earth with the hand.
verses.verse_html: 2Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one, which as a tempest of hail and a destroying storm, as a flood of mighty waters overflowing, shall cast down to the earth with the hand.

verses.text_plain: The crown of pride, the drunkards of Ephraim, shall be trodden under feet:
verses.verse_html:
3The crown of pride, the drunkards of Ephraim, shall be trodden under feet: ▼
▼ under…: Heb. with feet

footnotes.body_html: ▼ under…: Heb. with feet

verses.text_plain: And the glorious beauty, which is on the head of the fat valley, shall be a fading flower, and as the hasty fruit before the summer; which when he that looketh upon it seeth, while it is yet in his hand he eateth it up.
verses.verse_html:
4And the glorious beauty, which is on the head of the fat valley, shall be a fading flower, and as the hasty fruit before the summer; which when he that looketh upon it seeth, while it is yet in his hand he eateth it up. ▼
▼ eateth: Heb. swalloweth

tokens.text: while it is yet in his hand

verses.text_plain: In that day shall the Lord of hosts be for a crown of glory, and for a diadem of beauty, unto the residue of his people,
verses.verse_html: 5In that day shall the Lord of hosts be for a crown of glory, and for a diadem of beauty, unto the residue of his people,

verses.text_plain: And for a spirit of judgment to him that sitteth in judgment, and for strength to them that turn the battle to the gate.
verses.verse_html: 6And for a spirit of judgment to him that sitteth in judgment, and for strength to them that turn the battle to the gate.

verses.text_plain: But they also have erred through wine, and through strong drink are out of the way; the priest and the prophet have erred through strong drink, they are swallowed up of wine, they are out of the way through strong drink; they err in vision, they stumble in judgment.
verses.verse_html: 7But they also have erred through wine, and through strong drink are out of the way; the priest and the prophet have erred through strong drink, they are swallowed up of wine, they are out of the way through strong drink; they err in vision, they stumble in judgment.

tokens.text: they are out of the way

verses.text_plain: For all tables are full of vomit and filthiness, so that there is no place clean.
verses.verse_html: 8For all tables are full of vomit and filthiness, so that there is no place clean.

verses.text_plain: Whom shall he teach knowledge? and whom shall he make to understand doctrine? them that are weaned from the milk, and drawn from the breasts.
verses.verse_html:
9Whom shall he teach knowledge? and whom shall he make to understand doctrine? them that are weaned from the milk, and drawn from the breasts. ▼
▼ doctrine: Heb. the hearing?

tokens.text: and whom shall he make to understand

footnotes.body_html: ▼ doctrine: Heb. the hearing?

verses.text_plain: For precept must be upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; here a little, and there a little:
verses.verse_html:
10For precept must be upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; here a little, and there a little: ▼
▼ must be: or, hath been

footnotes.body_html: ▼ must be: or, hath been

verses.text_plain: For with stammering lips and another tongue will he speak to this people.
verses.verse_html:
11For with stammering lips and another tongue will he speak to this people. ▼
▼ stammering…: Heb. stammerings of lip
 , ▼
▼ will…: or, he hath spoken

footnotes.body_html: ▼ stammering…: Heb. stammerings of lip
▼ will…: or, he hath spoken

verses.text_plain: To whom he said, This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing: yet they would not hear.
verses.verse_html: 12To whom he said, This is the rest wherewith ye may cause the weary to rest; and this is the refreshing: yet they would not hear.

verses.text_plain: But the word of the Lord was unto them precept upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; here a little, and there a little; that they might go, and fall backward, and be broken, and snared, and taken.
verses.verse_html: 13But the word of the Lord was unto them precept upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; here a little, and there a little; that they might go, and fall backward, and be broken, and snared, and taken.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore hear the word of the Lord, ye scornful men, that rule this people which is in Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 14Wherefore hear the word of the Lord, ye scornful men, that rule this people which is in Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: Because ye have said, We have made a covenant with death, and with hell are we at agreement; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through, it shall not come unto us: for we have made lies our refuge, and under falsehood have we hid ourselves:
verses.verse_html: 15Because ye have said, We have made a covenant with death, and with hell are we at agreement; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through, it shall not come unto us: for we have made lies our refuge, and under falsehood have we hid ourselves:

tokens.text: unto us: for we have made

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, I lay in Zion for a foundation a stone, a tried stone, a precious corner stone, a sure foundation: he that believeth shall not make haste.
verses.verse_html: 16Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, I lay in Zion for a foundation a stone, a tried stone, a precious corner stone, a sure foundation: he that believeth shall not make haste.

verses.text_plain: Judgment also will I lay to the line, and righteousness to the plummet: and the hail shall sweep away the refuge of lies, and the waters shall overflow the hiding place.
verses.verse_html: 17Judgment also will I lay to the line, and righteousness to the plummet: and the hail shall sweep away the refuge of lies, and the waters shall overflow the hiding place.

verses.text_plain: And your covenant with death shall be disannulled, and your agreement with hell shall not stand; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through, then ye shall be trodden down by it.
verses.verse_html:
18And your covenant with death shall be disannulled, and your agreement with hell shall not stand; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through, then ye shall be trodden down by it. ▼
▼ trodden…: Heb. a treading down to it

tokens.text: then ye shall be trodden down

footnotes.body_text: ▼ trodden…: Heb. a treading down to it
footnotes.body_html: ▼ trodden…: Heb. a treading down to it

verses.text_plain: From the time that it goeth forth it shall take you: for morning by morning shall it pass over, by day and by night: and it shall be a vexation only to understand the report.
verses.verse_html:
19From the time that it goeth forth it shall take you: for morning by morning shall it pass over, by day and by night: and it shall be a vexation only to understand the report. ▼
▼ to…: or, when he shall make you to understand doctrine

tokens.text: and it shall be a vexation

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to…: or, when he shall make you to understand doctrine
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to…: or, when he shall make you to understand doctrine

verses.text_plain: For the bed is shorter than that a man can stretch himself on it: and the covering narrower than that he can wrap himself in it.
verses.verse_html: 20For the bed is shorter than that a man can stretch himself on it: and the covering narrower than that he can wrap himself in it.

verses.text_plain: For the Lord shall rise up as in mount Perazim, he shall be wroth as in the valley of Gibeon, that he may do his work, his strange work; and bring to pass his act, his strange act.
verses.verse_html: 21For the Lord shall rise up as in mount Perazim, he shall be wroth as in the valley of Gibeon, that he may do his work, his strange work; and bring to pass his act, his strange act.

verses.text_plain: Now therefore be ye not mockers, lest your bands be made strong: for I have heard from the Lord God of hosts a consumption, even determined upon the whole earth.
verses.verse_html: 22Now therefore be ye not mockers, lest your bands be made strong: for I have heard from the Lord God of hosts a consumption, even determined upon the whole earth.

tokens.text: Now therefore be ye not mockers

verses.text_plain: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
verses.verse_html: 23Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.

verses.text_plain: Doth the plowman plow all day to sow? doth he open and break the clods of his ground?
verses.verse_html: 24Doth the plowman plow all day to sow? doth he open and break the clods of his ground?

verses.text_plain: When he hath made plain the face thereof, doth he not cast abroad the fitches, and scatter the cummin, and cast in the principal wheat and the appointed barley and the rie in their place?
verses.verse_html:
25When he hath made plain the face thereof, doth he not cast abroad the fitches, and scatter the cummin, and cast in the principal wheat and the appointed barley and the rie in their place? ▼
▼ the principal…: or, the wheat in the principal place, and barley in the appointed place
 , ▼
▼ rie: or, spelt
 , ▼
▼ place: Heb. border?

tokens.text: thereof, doth he not cast abroad

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the principal…: or, the wheat in the principal place, and barley in the appointed place
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the principal…: or, the wheat in the principal place, and barley in the appointed place

verses.text_plain: For his God doth instruct him to discretion, and doth teach him.
verses.verse_html:
26For his God doth instruct him to discretion, and doth teach him. ▼
▼ For…: or, And he bindeth it in such sort as his God doth teach him

footnotes.body_text: ▼ For…: or, And he bindeth it in such sort as his God doth teach him
footnotes.body_html: ▼ For…: or, And he bindeth it in such sort as his God doth teach him

verses.text_plain: For the fitches are not threshed with a threshing instrument, neither is a cart wheel turned about upon the cummin; but the fitches are beaten out with a staff, and the cummin with a rod.
verses.verse_html: 27For the fitches are not threshed with a threshing instrument, neither is a cart wheel turned about upon the cummin; but the fitches are beaten out with a staff, and the cummin with a rod.

verses.text_plain: Bread corn is bruised; because he will not ever be threshing it, nor break it with the wheel of his cart, nor bruise it with his horsemen.
verses.verse_html: 28Bread corn is bruised; because he will not ever be threshing it, nor break it with the wheel of his cart, nor bruise it with his horsemen.

verses.text_plain: This also cometh forth from the Lord of hosts, which is wonderful in counsel, and excellent in working.
verses.verse_html: 29This also cometh forth from the Lord of hosts, which is wonderful in counsel, and excellent in working.
